snippet: President Obama has put forward a generally pragmatic vision for the 21st century, while also addressing the nation’s deep fiscal problems.
abstract: Editorial expresses qualified support for Pres Obama's new defense strategy, which espouses a smarter and more restrained use of military force; maintains real impact of strategy will be seen in the budget he unveils.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has put forward a generally pragmatic vision for the 21st century, while also addressing the nation’s deep fiscal problems.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
